text: Hi, not really development related but how do i change the host of a meeting on a deal?

Hi everyone,
has anyone else noticed that the "Reveal in finder" functionality is no longer working?
I'm talking about when you right click on an open tab in the Design Tools and click on "Reveal in finder" to scroll the file into view on the left file tree. I've always relied on this functionality, super useful, but now it seems broken to me.

Hi everyone! I'm new here.. I'm adding embed HubSpot calendars on Success Messages on forms (that are separated pages on my website ). However, I am not able to change height of embed HubSpot calendar. Do you know how I can via css change height of calendars? Thank you in advance!

Hello,
Is it possible to have a custom domain on a content staging for our HubSpot website? Any links or how to do it is much appreciated.

Basically, I want to have a custom domain to the _<http://your-domain.sandbox.hs-sites.com|your-domain.sandbox.hs-sites.com>_ as per <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/redesign-and-relaunch-your-site-with-content-staging> article

Hello! I am working on a website for a CPA firm and our content writer has indicated that some of the main headlines should be linked to other pages. The color/style I have set up in the "Theme" for the blog post links does not show up on the different section backgrounds I have designed for the main website pages. So I have set up a few different classes to use on the main website pages depending on the color background but I am wondering what creative way you have used to make it obvious a headline is a link - other than an underline.
Link icon to right of headline. Light colored underline as a border
But for usability it should be obvious

Hello,
I'm trying to integrate a text messaging platform (massiv) to HubSpot, so that it works in the communication automation flows. This integration is done via API, but I can't understand very well how, has anyone already integrated other platforms with hubsport via API?
